text: "The God of Abraham Praise" is a Christian version of the Jewish hymn Yigdal. It was first translated and made into a Christian hymn by Thomas Olivers after a visit to the Great Synagogue of London in 1770. It was first published in 1772. ==References== == Other websites == * YouTube; The God of Abraham Praise hymn Category:Christian hymns
title: The God of Abraham Praise
